chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), dist_compl_def_0 A (single A m)

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally
dist_compl_def_0 : forall A : Set, prechain A -> Prop
single : forall A : Set, Map A -> prechain A
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
pre_domok_incr_chain_0 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), pre_domok_incr_chain_def A (single A m)
dist_single : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), dist_chain A (single A x)
non_dist_concat_s : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), non_dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) x)
incr_single : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A), prechain_incr A r (single A x)
dist_concat_s : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) y)
domok_single : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T (single A x)
chain_single : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> chain A T r (single A x)
alist_of_Map_sorts2 : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), alist_sorted_2 A (alist_of_Map A m)
MapDomRestrTo_idempotent : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), eqmap A (MapDomRestrTo A A m m) m
alist_of_Map_semantics : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), eqm A (MapGet A m) (alist_semantics A (alist_of_Map A m))
ad_alloc_opt_optimal_1 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (a : ad), Nleb (ad_alloc_opt A m) a = false -> {y : A | MapGet A m a = Some y}
MapDelta_empty_m : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), eqmap A (MapDelta A (M0 A) m) m
MapDelta_sym : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A), eqmap A (MapDelta A m m') (MapDelta A m' m)
chain_concat_s : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A (single A x) y)
ad_list_of_dom_Dom : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), ad_list_of_dom A m = ad_list_of_dom unit (MapDom A m)
prechain_rect : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Type), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
prechain_rec : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Set), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
prechain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
MapPut_behind_as_Merge : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), eqmap A (MapPut_behind A m a y) (MapMerge A (M1 A a y) m)
MapCard_Put_ub : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapCard A (MapPut A m a y) <= S (MapCard A m)
dist_chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall x : Map A, P (single A x)) -> (forall x y : Map A, x <> y -> P (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> P (concat A z x) -> P (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall p : prechain A, dist_chain A p -> P p
non_dist_chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall x : Map A, P (concat A (single A x) x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (z : prechain A), P (concat A (concat A z x) x)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> P (concat A z x) -> P (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall p : prechain A, non_dist_chain A p -> P p
prechain_incr_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A), P r (single A x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (r : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), r (prechain_last A p) x -> prechain_incr A r p -> P r p -> P r (concat A p x)) -> forall (m : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), prechain_incr A m p -> P m p
MapDom_Dom : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad), in_dom A a m = in_FSet a (MapDom A m)
prechain_dom_ok_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A), T x -> P T (single A x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), T x -> prechain_dom_ok A T p -> P T p -> P T (concat A p x)) -> forall (m : mEnsemble A) (p : prechain A), prechain_dom_ok A m p -> P m p

```coq
intros A m.
apply prechain_rect.
- intro x. apply dist_single.
- intros p Hp x. rewrite <- Hp. apply dist_concat_s. auto.
Qed.
```

original: intros A m. apply prechain_rect. - intro x. apply dist_single. - intros p Hp x. rewrite <- Hp. apply dist_concat_s. auto.
